name: STAR CORE
description:
Welcome to STAR CORE !!!

Take control of the Star Core on the middle of the platform to win points but take care ! Dragons won't let you take it so easily, they will come in wave and if you survive long enough they will call "for some help"... To help you buy weapons on the smal flying platform, the more it cost the more power you will get ! But beware you are not the only one hunting for the Core...

Credits :
Thanks to all the contributors of Community Content and the CORE Discord.
Special thanks to Standard Combo (Gabriel) with Lua help and Tobs for streaming and supporting this game.

MADE WITH CORE FOR KINDA FUNNY JAM 2020

You only have to download CORE to play this game and its FREE.
